message:
My first UserScripts submission.
http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/150410
--
it's a script to enhance the experience of the Pluralsight (http://pluralsight.com/training/Courses/NewReleases) Courses list page that will add filter/sort capabilities to it.

PS: you will need to install GreaseMonkey Firefox addon in order to make use of this script, Chrome was supporting it natively, but since V21 they changes the security features so you will need to workaround this first.
this link may be handy for Chrome users: http://userscripts.org/topics/115329?page=1#posts-456415
name: Pluralsight Sort Lists for Greasemonkey
caption: userscripts.org
description: This script will simply gives you the ability to sort the courses list on the main Pluralsight courses list by any column, or even filter courses according to any criteria you want (Course name, Author, Release month, Level).

data.message: Don't forget to add this to your CV :)
